xml.data:
Home » 31Dht Dhātukathāpāḷi » 2 Niddesa » 2.10 Dasamanaya Vippayuttenavippayuttapadaniddesa » 2.10.2 Duka
2.10.2.3 Āsavagocchaka
Niddesa
Dasamanaya Vippayuttenavippayuttapadaniddesa
Duka
Āsavagocchaka
392.
482Āsavehi dhammehi ye dhammā…  āsavasampayuttehi dhammehi ye dhammā…  āsavehi ceva sāsavehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā…  āsavehi ceva āsavasampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā…  āsavasampayuttehi ceva no ca āsavehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā…  te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā; ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici vippayuttā.
393.
483Anāsavehi dhammehi ye dhammā…  āsavavippayuttehi anāsavehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā…  te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi chahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.
<< 2.10.2.2 Cūḷantaradukaup2.10.2.4--9 Saṃyojanagocchakādi >>
